code: import{combineReducers}from"redux";import userReducer from"./user/user-reducer";import cartReducer from"./cart/cart.reducer";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import directoryReducer from"./directory/directory.reducer";import shopReducer from"./shop/shop.reducer";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage,whitelist:["cart"]};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,shop:shopReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
